props.flat: Display component without elevation. Default elevation for thumb is 4dp, `flat` resets it
props.indeterminate: Sets an indeterminate state for the checkbox
props.indeterminateIcon: The icon used when in an indeterminate state
props.inset: Enlarge the `v-switch` track to encompass the thumb
props.mandatory: Forces a selection on a `v-radio` child
props.multiple: Changes expected model to an array
props.name: Sets the component's name attribute

events.change: Emitted when the input is changed by user interaction
